page.title: 02TRANSPORT
page.content: RAIL:THE SETTLE-CARLISLE RAILWAY RUNS THROUGH WHARTON - NEAREST STATION APPLEBY 12 MILES. ROADS: LOCAL ROADS AND BRIDGES WELL MAINTAINED BY CUMBRIA COUNTY COUNCIL.PASSING THROUGH NATEBY & WHARTON ARE B6270 KIRKBY STEPHEN- REETH AND B6259 KIRKBY STEPHEN-HAWES. BUS/COACH:NO SERVICES RUN THROUGH NATEBY OR WHARTON.A DAILY SERVICE NEWCASTLE-BLACKPOOL OPERATES THROUGH KIRKBY STEPHEN.LONDON-GLASGOW DAILY THROUGH BROUGH. CAR: OVER THREE- QUARTERS OF THE 42 HOUSEHOLDS OWN A CAR, FARMS USUALLY OWNING ADDITIONALLY A VAN OR LANDROVER.REPAIRS AND PETROL AVAILABLE AT NATEBY. TELEPHONE: OVER THREEQUARTERS OF HOUSEHOLDS HAVE TELEPHONE INSTALLED. WHARTON & NATEBY EACH HAVE A PUBLIC CALL-BOX. POST: WHARTON & NATEBY EACH HAVE A LETTER- BOX.COLLECTIONS AND DELIVERIES TWICE DAILY ON WEEKDAYS.
